pageContext.claim: “The Democrats are trying to belittle the concept of a Wall, calling it old fashioned. The fact is there is nothing else’s that will work, and that has been true for thousands of years. It’s like the wheel, there is nothing better. I know tech better than anyone, & technology on a Border is only effective in conjunction with a Wall. Properly designed and built Walls work, and the Democrats are lying when they say they don't.”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats reject the idea of the wall not because it's "old fashioned," but rather, because there's little evidence that it will help solve any issues that Trump point to from drug trafficking to illegal immigration, while being tremendously expensive.
